content: The Act titled "Los Angeles Homeless Veterans Leasing Act of 2016" authorizes certain leases at the Department of Veterans Affairs West Los Angeles Campus. The Secretary of Veterans Affairs may carry out leases at the Department of Veterans Affairs West Los Angeles Campus for providing supportive housing to benefit veterans and their families. The leases can include enhanced-use leases and leases not exceeding 50 years.
